main.node: Display on the Form to the User

name: Generate Content Ideas from PDFs with InfraNodus GraphRAG and AI Gap Analysis

parameters.content:
## Optional: Better PDF Conversion

### Standard Map PDF to Text node will split your PDF files into very short chunks, which deteriorates retrieval. 

Use can use [ConvertAPI](https://convertapi.com?ref=4l54n) which is a high-quality convertor that will respect the layout of the original document and not cut the paragraphs into short chunks. 

Here is an HTTP node that makes a request to their API to convert the PDF into text. If you have a ConvertAPI account, you can replace the "Extract Text from PDF" node in Step 3 with this node. 

Note that you will need to map the text output from this node correctly in the Step 4 after.

parameters.formTitle: Find Content Gaps in Your PDF Files
parameters.formDescription: Upload the files you'd like to analyze and we will extract content gaps and interesting questions based on them.

nodes.name: Display on the Form to the User

parameters.content:
## Step 1: User uploads the PDF files for analysis

### You can expose this endpoint and make it publicly available via a URL to your organization.

## Step 2: Convert uploaded binaries into PDF files

### We need to convert the binaries uploaded to the PDF files so we can extract text from them.

## Step 3: Extract plain text from PDF files

### For better quality text extraction, you can use the optional [ConvertAPI](https://convertapi.com?ref=4l54n) node to the right, which respects the files' original formatting.

## Step 4: Combine extracted text into a text string

### Prepare data for InfraNodus: combine all the extracted text into a text string and also tell InfraNodus the gap depth it should use when generating advice

## Step 5: Use InfraNodus GraphRAG to Find a Content Gap and Generate Advice

### Optionally, you can use the node below to generate questions (AI prompts) instead of ready-made ideas. These may be more interesting if you'd like to integrate this template into your existing research workflow.

ðŸš¨ PROVIDE YOUR INFRANODUS API KEY HERE

## Step 6: Show advice / question / prompt to the user

### Optionally, you can feed the response to your other n8n workflow or expose it via a webhook and show it in your own app using an iframe.

# Find content gaps in PDF documents using the InfraNodus GraphRAG

## How does the [InfraNodus](https://infranodus.com) GraphRAG work?

### 1. It represents your text as a network of concepts and relations

### 2. It then identifies the clusters that are furthest apart from each other â€” they appear in the same context (your texts) but are not well connected

### 3. InfraNodus will then use the AI to generate an idea / question / prompt that bridges this gap â€” touching upon relevant topics but connecting them in a new way

![structural gap infranodus](https://infranodus.com/images/front/infranodus-structural-gaps-ideas.jpg)
